H0.text: Transportation has had the greatest impact from the Wright Brothers' invention.

H1.text: Communication has been most impacted by the Wright Brothers' invention.

H2.text: Mass production is the greatest impact of the Wright Brothers' invention.

H3.text: Space exploration is the area that has been most impacted by the Wright Brothers' invention.

A4.text: The Wright Brothers invented the first successful airplane, which is a key innovation in transportation.

A5.text: The Wright Brothers' development of the three-axis control system made fixed-wing powered flight possible, which is fundamental to modern aviation.
